Question: Mosqitter Inc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Mosqitter Inc

Product: Mosqitter Mini

- Compact, eco-friendly mosquito control solution for small outdoor spaces
- Utilizes CO2, heat signatures, UV light, and scent to attract and trap mosquitoes
- Operates silently without buzzing or zapping noises
- Suitable for both outdoor and indoor use
- Weighs 4 pounds and stands at 13.7 inches tall
- Energy-saving, consuming only 35 watts
- Available for sale in Fall 2024 with a $149.99 MSRP
- Will be showcased at CES 2024 in Las Vegas at Booth 50117
